InstructionData.Title: [F&S] Solar Panel Tracking
InstructionData.Description: Tracks the position of the sun, at night moves to the position of the sunrise.â€‹
InstructionData.Instructions:
define SolarHorizontalAngle 0 define EveningMorningAngle 85 #90=night,85=twilight
alias DaySensor d0 alias Dial d1 alias NSignal d2
fMain: jal fCalcVertical jal fCalcHorizontal jal fNightSignal yield j fMain
fCalcHorizontal: move r10 ra jal fDialSettings pop r14 brltz r14 3 mul r14 90 r14 jr 2 mul r14 90 SolarHorizontalAngle brdse DaySensor 3 lb r15 1076425094 Horizontal 0 jr 2 l r15 DaySensor Horizontal add r15 r15 r14 breqz r0 2 add r15 r14 270 sb -2045627372 Horizontal r15 sb -539224550 Horizontal r15 sb -934345724 Horizontal r15 sb -1545574413 Horizontal r15 move ra r10 j ra
fCalcVertical: brdse DaySensor 3 lb r15 1076425094 Vertical 0 jr 2 l r15 DaySensor Vertical sgt r1 r15 EveningMorningAngle brgt r15 95 3 move r0 0 jr 2 move r0 1 brgt r15 75 4 sub r15 r15 90 abs r15 r15 jr 2 move r15 15 sb -2045627372 Vertical r15 sb -539224550 Vertical r15 sb -934345724 Vertical r15 sb -1545574413 Vertical r15 j ra
fDialSettings: brdse Dial 3 push -1 j ra l r15 Dial PrefabHash breq r15 554524804 3 push -1 j ra s Dial Mode 3 l r15 Dial Setting push r15 j ra
fNightSignal: brdse NSignal 2 j ra l r15 NSignal PrefabHash brne r15 -851746783 3 s NSignal Setting r1 j ra s NSignal On r1 #err: On not supported j ra
